```{r}
# Attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(forcats)
library(readxl)
library(riverdist)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
# Read in taimen movements & filter for > 1 aquisitions
taimen <- read_excel("Taimen_Movements_Eg_Selenge.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  group_by(code) %>%
  filter(n() > 1) %>%
  ungroup()

```

```{r}
# Convert to sf object and project to UTM
taimen_sf <- st_as_sf(taimen, coords = c("long_adjusted", "lat_adjusted")) %>%
  st_set_crs(4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs = 32648)

# Find max euclidian distance
distances <- taimen_sf %>%
  group_by(code) %>% 
  summarize(
    max_dist_m = max(st_distance(geometry, geometry)))
  
```
